text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, the day of the Pretty Grand<n>Prix finals is finally here!
First up is the<n>performance section, and our rivals<n>look
pretty tough.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Well, since I've gotten this far, I might<n>as well show them
how a pro does it.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Cityyyyy! You're positively stunn'n!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Everyone, do you all have yourinstant cameras with you? Booyah!V for victory!

text_block_list.name: Cafe Lady
text_block_list.text: Maruzensky! You're totally tubular!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Good grief, who even put my name<n>in? Regardless, if I'm
competing, then<n>I'm winning—that's all there is to it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (It's Groove! I'm in the presence ofthe Empress! )

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In the performance section, Gold<n>City's modeling
experience makes<n>her the favorite. But today, Curren's<n>in
tip-top form—she's got a fighting<n>chance!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
I've returned from my training arc!<n>Everyone, check out the
new me,<n>okay? ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Da-da-da-daaah! ☆

text_block_list.name: Fangirl Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Cute Curren Chan!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Next up is the race section. Like the<n>preliminaries, it'll be a
time trial. This is<n>Curren's chance to make amends.
choice_data_list: Are your cleats hammered on tight?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Yup, snug as a bug! ♪ Thanks for<n>putting them on for me,
Big<n>Bro—you're the best!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Yup, snug as a bug! ♪ Thanks for<n>putting them on for me,
Big Sis—you're<n>the best!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
...Still, my opponents are all older and<n>stronger than me. And
thanks to what<n>happened at the prelims, it feels like<n>
everyone's waiting for me to slip up.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
In times like these, I just gotta<n>believe in the path I've
chosen. Well,<n>that and...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
It's just, if you told me I was cute,<n>Big Bro... It might give
me that extra<n>boost I need, you know?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
It's just, if you told me I was cute,<n>Big Sis... It might give me
that extra<n>boost I need, you know?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: You can do better than that! But...<n>thanks.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Hehe, you really said it!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...Yup, so far, so good! ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
If I want to cut my time down... then I<n>just have to sprint as
fast as I can!

text_block_list.name: Serious Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
...So she made it out of the gate well<n>enough, huh? Let's
see what she can<n>do out on the turf.

text_block_list.name: Race-loving Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I hope she doesn't lose<n>another cleat today!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I can hear you! Right back at<n>you—don't come crying
to me if my<n>running makes you swoon!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: After all...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: ...You're cute.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: For the first time... my trainer used the<n>magic words!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
That's why... I don't care if I'm up<n>against the academy,
Japan, or even<n>the whole wide world...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Today, I'll be the cutest of them all!

text_block_list.name: Race Staff
text_block_list.text:
She's done it! Curren Chan has<n>achieved a new record in
today's<n>finals!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Hey, you saw that...right?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Huh? Not cute, but cool?! That's<n>weird... Haha!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Oh well! We've still got the speech<n>left, don't we?
Everyone's hearts are<n>as good as mine! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The final speech section is right after<n>this. I try to think of
some advice I can<n>give Curren as her trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's definitely heartwarming that she<n>works so hard to
make people happy<n>with her cuteness, but...
choice_data_list:
I think people would be happy to see more of
the real you.

I think people would be happy to see more of
the real you.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Huh? I was trying to make that our<n>little secret, Big Bro. ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Huh? I was trying to make that our<n>little secret, Big Sis. ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
But if that's what you want... then<n>okay—just a pinch! Keep
those eyes<n>and ears glued on me, and only me! ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
But if that's what you want... then<n>okay—just a pinch! Keep
those eyes<n>and ears glued on me, and only me! ♪

text_block_list.name: Trendy Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Curren's speech is up next! Oh<n>wooow, I wonder what
she's going to<n>talk about?

text_block_list.name: Serious Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Her running just now was great.<n>But... it also might've been
a fluke.<n>Can she prove to the world that her<n>talent is the
real deal?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Once the venue simmers down,<n>Curren begins to speak.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Today, I have something important to<n>tell everyone. Um, my
dream...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...is to perfect the ultimate cuteness!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Chatter...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Cuteness—it lies in everyone's<n>hearts! Cuteness—it's the
power to<n>bring joy to others!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Cuteness—it's an never-ending<n>pursuit! Cuteness—it's the
love I give<n>to you all!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
I want all of your lives to be filled with<n>cuteness... That's my
dream—why I'm<n>standing here today!

text_block_list.name: Serious Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Wh-what is this thumping feeling in<n>my chest?! It's... It's
C... C...

text_block_list.name: Serious Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Cute Curren Chan!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Curren's speech, though barely three<n>minutes long, quickly
becomes the<n>stuff of legend, and Curren secures<n>first
place in the Pretty Grand Prix.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After the event, I find Curren waiting<n>for me on the school
rooftop. Perhaps<n>this is the time to ask something<n>that's
been on my mind for a while...
choice_data_list: How come you picked me as your trainer?
How come you picked me as your trainer?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
You really want to know? Well... I<n>picked you because I
thought it'd be<n>easy to have you under my thumb! ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, but that's not all—you really<n>don't remember? Way
back when,<n>we met each other once before.

text_block_list.name: Young Curren
text_block_list.text: My dream... is to be the cutest person<n>in the universe!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Back then, you didn't laugh at my<n>dream. You told me,
"That's a<n>wonderful dream," and flashed me a<n>warm
smile.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Back then, you didn't laugh at my<n>dream. You told me,
"That's a<n>wonderful dream," and flashed me a<n>warm
smile.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I see... So she was that girl from the<n>theme park... While I'm
still lost in my<n>memories, Curren suddenly comes<n>right up
to me.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Hey, Big Bro. Tell me, how cute am I?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Hey, Big Sis. Tell me, how cute am I?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I already know the answer she's<n>looking for!
choice_data_list: You're the cutest in the universe!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Hm? What was that flash just now?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, this shot's a keeper! ♪ Open<n>up Umasta... aaand
uploaded! ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
"#CurrenAndTrainer<n>#OnlyTheBeginning<n>
#CuteCurrenChan"

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Curren's cuteness revolution has<n>only just begun. I'll stay
by her side,<n>and support her along every step of<n>this
endless journey!
